title: Question 13:
description: Is there a minimum staking period?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value: During Phase 0, you will not be able to unstake or withdraw your tokens. Once Phase 1 starts (planned for September) you will be able to unstake your tokens after 24 hours. Note: there is a 30 day unbonding period for unstaking. During this time rewards are not accumulated.
